Text:
Musical tastes are as different as opinions and the assholes who have them. But this is some pretty bad "ska". Personally, I would've named this torrent "poppy rock crap from canada"...

If you wanna hear some good ska, check out Hepcat, the Specials, Madness, and Eastern Standard time.

Ya, I agree... Someone asked me for this so here it is...

I personally dig more traditional ska and ska-jazz... mayhaps I should upload a pile of real ska :)
